actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to repeal a waiver that permitted the issuance of a certificate of documentation with endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel COLUMBUS, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Coast Guard Authorization Act of 1997 (the Act) to repeal, if issued prior to enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Transportation's issuance of a certificate of documentation (waiver) with endorsement for the employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel COLUMBUS (U.S. official number 590658). Directs the Secretary to issue a revised certificate of documentation for such vessel that is consistent with the limitations on the operation of that vessel that applied to it on the day before the enactment the Act.

titles.title: A bill to repeal a waiver that permitted the issuance of a certificate of documentation with endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel COLUMBUS, and for other purposes.
